globalHeaders.Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com; img-src 'self' data:; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com; connect-src 'self'; frame-src 'none'; object-src 'none'; base-uri 'self'
